data.name: Sample - PaloAlto Cortex XDR - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "PaloAlto Cortex XDR" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Incident Details
workflows.description: Get extra data fields of a specific incident including alerts and key artifacts.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Incident Details

workflows.name: Restore File
workflows.description: Restore a quarantined file on a requested endpoints.

workflows.name: Cancel Scan Endpoints
workflows.description: Run a scan on selected endpoints.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Cancel Scan Endpoints

workflows.name: Create Distributions
workflows.description: Create an installation package.

workflows.name: Delete Endpoints
workflows.description: Delete selected endpoints in the Cortex XDR app. You can delete up to 100 endpoints.

workflows.name: Get All Endpoints
workflows.description: Gets a list of your endpoints.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get All Endpoints

workflows.name: Get Audit Agent Report
workflows.description: Get agent event reports.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Audit Agent Report

workflows.name: Get Audit Management Logs
workflows.description: Get audit management logs.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Audit Management Logs

workflows.name: Get Device Violations
workflows.description: Gets a list of device violations filtered by selected fields.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Device Violations

workflows.name: Get Distribution Status
workflows.description: Check the status of the installation package.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Distribution Status

workflows.name: Get Distribution URL
workflows.description: Get the distribution URL for downloading the installation package.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Distribution URL

workflows.name: Get Distribution Version
workflows.description: Get a list of all the agent versions to use for creating a distribution list.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Distribution Version

workflows.name: Get Endpoints
workflows.description: Gets a list of filtered endpoints.

workflows.name: Get Policy
workflows.description: Get the policy name for a specific endpoint.

workflows.name: Insert Parsed Alerts
workflows.description: Upload alerts from external alert sources in Cortex XDR format. Cortex XDR displays alerts that are parsed successfully in related incidents and views.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Insert Parsed Alerts

workflows.name: Isolate Endpoints
workflows.description: Isolate one or more endpoints in a single request.

workflows.name: Quarantine Files
workflows.description: Quarantine file on selected endpoints.

workflows.name: Scan Endpoints
workflows.description: Run a scan on selected endpoints.

workflows.name: Unisolate Endpoints
workflows.description: Unisolate one or more endpoints in a single request.

workflows.name: Update Incident
workflows.description: Update incident fields like severity, status etc. corresponding to a specific incident on Palo Alto Traps.

workflows.name: Whitelist Files
workflows.description: Whitelist requested files which have not already been blacklisted or whitelisted.

workflows.name: Blacklist Files
workflows.description: Blacklist requested files which have not already been blacklisted or whitelisted.

workflows.name: Fetch Incidents
workflows.description: Fetch incidents from Palo Alto Traps based on the input parameters specified.

workflows.name: Get Quarantine Status
workflows.description: Retrieve the quarantine status for a selected file.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Get Quarantine Status

workflows.name: Insert CEF Alerts
workflows.description: Upload alerts in CEF format from external alert sources. After you map CEF alert fields to Cortex XDR fields, Cortex XDR displays the alerts in related incidents and views.

arguments.title: PaloAlto Cortex XDR: Insert CEF Alerts

params.alerts: CEF:0|Check Point|VPN-1 & FireWall-1|Check Point|Log|Log|Unknown|             act=AcceptdeviceDirection=0 rt=1569477501000 spt=63088 dpt=5985             cs2Label=Rule Namelayer_name=FW_Device_blackened             Securitylayer_uuid=07693fc7-1a5c-4f31-8afe-77ae96c71b8c match_id=8899             parent_rule=0rule_action=Accept             rule_uid=ae987933-82c0-470f-ab1c-1ad552c82369conn_direction=Internal ifname=bond1.12             logid=0loguid={0x5d8c537d,0xbb,0x29321fac,0xc0000014}             origin=1.1.1.1originsicname=CN=DWdeviceBlackend,O=Blackend sequencenum=899             version=5dst=1.1.1.1 product=VPN-1 & FireWall-1 proto=6 src=1.1.1.1

workflows.name: Retrieve File
workflows.description: Retrieve files from selected endpoints. You can retrieve up to 20 files, from no more than 100 endpoints.
